cvar 0.4.1
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

cvar 0.4.1 Unreleased

  • changed the JSS reference to use the new-style doi.

  • fixed a bug in the tests, in v0.4-0, that was causing faiure of the tests on travis, despite all checks on CRAN passing with OK. devtools::test() was failing too, but only on the first run in a session, details in the git commit.

  • set up GHA.

cvar 0.4-0 (CRAN) 2019-03-15

cvar 0.3-1 Unreleased

  • fix tests to pass with the changed R random generator.

  • some new examples and minor documentation changes.

cvar 0.3-0 (CRAN) 2018-10-06

cvar 0.2-1 Unreleased

  • now \VignetteIndexEntry in Guide_cvar.Rnw is plain text.

  • added experimental support for GARCH models - currently GARCH(1,1) (the API may change).

  • now the first argument of VaR() and ES() can be a numeric vector. This is useful, e.g., for computing VaR by simulation.

  • bugfix: in VaR_cdf() and VaR_qf(), the code for the if/else clauses had been wrongly swappped.

cvar 0.2-0 (CRAN) 2018-08-19

  • prepare for CRAN

cvar 0.1-3 Unreleased

  • suggest ‘covr’.

  • setup for travisCI and Coveralls.

  • more tests.

cvar 0.1-2 Unreleased

  • corrected \VignetteIndexEntry in the vignette — I used the vignette for Rdpack as a template but didn’t change this entry, which resulted in the vignette appearing with a puzzling title on CRAN and other sites.!

  • added author@R in DESCRIPTION.

  • added experimental web site (docs/)

cvar 0.1-1 (CRAN) 2018-04-09

  • added a doi to DESCRIPTION.

cvar 0.1-0 Unreleased

  • first public release.
